Projects

Data Science Projects

Data science projects spanning EDA, ML, optimization, and process control.

Foundational Projects

Foundational EDA Pandas Seaborn

Industrial Sensor Data Analysis

Deep-dive exploratory analysis of 16-channel gas sensor array with 65k+ timestamped readings. Identified cross-sensor correlations using heatmaps, quantified temporal drift with rolling statistics, and segmented response patterns by gas type.

65k+ readings 16 sensors 5 gases

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational Time Series ML Gradient Boosting

Energy Consumption Forecasting

Built and compared three forecasting models (Ridge, RF, GB) on 10-minute resolution energy data. Engineered temporal features, lag features (1h-1d), and rolling statistics. GB achieved R¬≤ 0.85+ with residual analysis.

20k samples R¬≤ 0.85+ 10min freq

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational ML Isolation Forest PCA

Multivariate Anomaly Detection

Implemented three strategies (Z-Score, Isolation Forest, PCA reconstruction) on 5-channel sensor streams. Detected point, contextual, and collective anomalies with 90%+ recall. Ensemble recommended for production.

3 methods 90%+ recall 5 channels

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational Optimization Surrogate Model Scipy

Manufacturing Yield Optimization

Used differential evolution with GB surrogate to maximize yield across 5 parameters. Latin Hypercube sampling, OAT sensitivity analysis, and global optimization identified optimal settings validated against simulator.

5 params 300 samples 95%+ yield

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational ML Classification Random Forest

Predictive Maintenance & Fault Diagnosis

Multi-class classification of machine states from vibration sensors. Extracted 12 statistical features (RMS, kurtosis, crest factor). Compared RF, GB, SVM with stratified CV. 95%+ accuracy with clear PCA separation.

95%+ accuracy 4 classes 2k samples

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational SPC Control Charts CUSUM

Statistical Process Control & Monitoring

Implemented I-MR control charts for 4 variables with UCL/LCL detection. Calculated Cpk indices for capability assessment. Applied CUSUM for early drift detection. Detected 100% of injected faults.

4 variables 100% detection 3 methods

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational ML Quality Analytics Root Cause

Manufacturing Quality & Defect Prediction

End-to-end quality pipeline: root-cause via logistic coefficients identified temperature, humidity, operator experience as drivers. Built prediction models with imbalance handling. GB achieved 0.92 AUC on 5k records.

0.92 AUC 5k records 9 features

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced Projects

Advanced EDA Transfer Entropy Wavelets

Advanced Sensor Data Analysis

Extended analysis with transfer entropy for causal inference between sensor pairs, wavelet decomposition for multi-scale temporal patterns, and dynamic time warping for pattern matching. Sophisticated signal processing beyond basic EDA.

Transfer Entropy Wavelets DTW

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced Time Series Deep Learning LSTM

Advanced Time Series Forecasting

Deep learning approaches with LSTM/GRU networks for sequence-to-sequence prediction. Compared with Prophet for automated seasonality detection. Feature engineering with Fourier transforms and external regressors.

LSTM Prophet Seq2Seq

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced Deep Learning VAE LSTM-AE

Advanced Anomaly Detection

Deep learning anomaly detection with Variational Autoencoders (VAE) and LSTM-Autoencoders for temporal anomalies. Comparison with classical methods. Bayesian approaches for uncertainty quantification in anomaly scores.

VAE LSTM-AE Bayesian

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced Optimization Genetic Algorithms Multi-Objective

Advanced Process Optimization

Multi-objective optimization with Pareto frontiers trading off yield, cost, and quality. Genetic algorithms for complex constraint handling. Robust optimization under uncertainty with Monte Carlo simulation.

Pareto Genetic Robust

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced ML XGBoost SHAP

Advanced Fault Classification

State-of-the-art ensemble methods (XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost) with hyperparameter tuning via Optuna. SHAP values for model interpretability. Calibration plots and threshold optimization for imbalanced classes.

XGBoost SHAP Optuna

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced SPC Multivariate Hotelling T¬≤

Advanced Statistical Process Control

Multivariate SPC with Hotelling T¬≤ charts, MEWMA (Multivariate EWMA), and PCA-based monitoring for high-dimensional processes. Change point detection algorithms and adaptive control limits.

Hotelling T¬≤ MEWMA PCA

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced ML Causal Inference Propensity

Advanced Quality & Causal Analysis

Causal inference for quality root-cause using propensity score matching and DAGs. Counterfactual analysis ‚Äúwhat-if‚Äù scenarios. Cost-sensitive learning for optimizing inspection/defect trade-offs.

Causal DAG Cost-Sensitive

View Analysis ‚Üí

<span class="metric"><strong>5</strong> gases</span>

::: {#noResults .no-results style="display: none;"}
No projects match your search. Try different keywords or clear filters.
:::

```{=html}
<script>
const tagMap = {
  basic: ['basic'],
  advanced: ['advanced'],
  eda: ['eda'],
  ml: ['ml', 'classification', 'anomaly', 'quality', 'prediction'],
  timeseries: ['timeseries', 'forecasting']
};

function filterProjects(category) {
  document.getElementById('searchBox').value = '';
  
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn');
  buttons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
  event.target.classList.add('active');

  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.project-card');
  let visibleCount = 0;
  
  cards.forEach(card => {
    if (category === 'all') {
      card.style.display = 'block';
      visibleCount++;
      return;
    }
    const tags = card.getAttribute('data-tags') || '';
    const match = (tagMap[category] || []).some(t => tags.includes(t));
    card.style.display = match ? 'block' : 'none';
    if (match) visibleCount++;
  });
  
  document.getElementById('noResults').style.display = visibleCount === 0 ? 'block' : 'none';
}

function searchProjects() {
  const searchTerm = document.getElementById('searchBox').value.toLowerCase();
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.project-card');
  let visibleCount = 0;
  
  if (searchTerm) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn').forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
  }
  
  cards.forEach(card => {
    const title = card.querySelector('h3').textContent.toLowerCase();
    const description = card.querySelector('p').textContent.toLowerCase();
    const tags = card.getAttribute('data-tags') || '';
    const keywords = card.getAttribute('data-keywords') || '';
    
    const searchable = `${title} ${description} ${tags} ${keywords}`.toLowerCase();
    const match = searchable.includes(searchTerm);
    
    card.style.display = match ? 'block' : 'none';
    if (match) visibleCount++;
  });
  
  document.getElementById('noResults').style.display = visibleCount === 0 ? 'block' : 'none';
}
</script>
```
